title: CSV to JSON
description: Convert CSV files to JSON format
placeholder: Paste CSV data or upload file...

instructions.title: How to use CSV to JSON Converter

steps.title: Paste or upload your CSV data
steps.description: Copy and paste your CSV data into the input area, or use the file upload button to import a CSV file from your computer. The tool automatically detects common delimiters.

steps.title: Configure parsing options
steps.description: Choose your CSV delimiter (comma, semicolon, tab, pipe), specify if first row contains headers, enable type detection for numbers and booleans, and select your preferred JSON output format (array, nested, or compact).

steps.title: Review and validate
steps.description: The tool will parse your CSV and display statistics including row count, column count, and any validation errors. Check the preview to ensure data is correctly interpreted.

steps.title: Copy or download JSON
steps.description: Once converted, copy the JSON output to your clipboard with one click or download it as a .json file for use in your applications, APIs, or databases.

features: Automatic delimiter detection (comma, semicolon, tab, pipe)
Smart type detection (numbers, booleans, null values)
Multiple output formats: array of objects, nested objects, compact format
Handles quoted fields and multiline CSV data
Preserves special characters and UTF-8 encoding
Works completely offline - no data upload to servers
useCases: Import spreadsheet data into web applications and APIs
Convert Excel exports to JSON for database migrations
Transform CSV reports into JSON for data visualization
Prepare data for NoSQL databases like MongoDB
Convert analytics exports to structured JSON format
Process CSV logs for API consumption
Import product catalogs from CSV to JSON
Migrate legacy data from CSV to modern JSON-based systems
proTips: Enable type detection to automatically convert numbers and booleans
Use custom headers if your CSV doesn't have a header row
Try different delimiters if parsing fails - tab and semicolon are common in European data
Compact format is great for reducing file size when transmitting data
Nested format works well when first column is a unique key or ID
Trim values option removes whitespace - useful for cleaning messy exports
troubleshooting: Inconsistent columns: Enable strict mode to detect rows with mismatched column counts
Wrong delimiter: Try auto-detection or manually select the correct delimiter (look for comma, semicolon, tab)
Type conversion issues: Disable type detection if numbers should remain as strings
Missing data: Configure null value detection to handle empty fields, 'N/A', or 'NULL' strings
Large files: Process in smaller chunks if browser performance degrades with files over 10MB

meta.title: CSV to JSON Converter - Free Online Tool | ToolsLab
meta.description: Convert CSV files to JSON format online. Support for custom delimiters and headers. Free CSV to JSON converter.

tagline: Convert CSV data to JSON format with smart parsing
pageDescription: Transform CSV files and data into JSON format with automatic header detection and custom delimiter support. Perfect for data migration, API integration, and spreadsheet processing. Handles large files with streaming, preserves data types, and offers multiple output formats. Free, secure browser-based conversion with no file uploads.
